properties.name: eureka.client.healthcheck.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Eureka health check handler.

properties.name: eureka.client.refresh.enable
properties.description: Determines whether the EurekaClient instance can be refreshed or not(If disabled none of the Eureka client properties will be refreshable).

properties.name: ribbon.eureka.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of Eureka with Ribbon.
